Text: I love the stuff submitted by TVTeam, but the audio on this episode really sucks. It's not out of synch, it just sounds like it is in the bottom of a trash can and recorded with a 99 cent mic.

Sorry guys!!!! Ignore my comment about the audio. It is fine. 
The problem is with VLC 2.0. when I max the volume it sounds like crap. I have no idea as the previous version of VLC didn't have this problem. 

sorry for the bad info...the torrent is fine
